textBeforeTable: Please use the chart below to convert between standard size formats Size Conversion Chart  Browse and buy Paul Smith Black clothing online today... The Paul Smith Black diffusion line was launched in 2005. Sartorially savvy, Paul Smith Black womenswear offers tailored separates from shirts, tapered trousers, sharp blazers and Paul Smith dresses. All experimenting with print and colour, each piece of clothing combines modern feminine appeal with clean-cut sophistication. Offering a range of men's and womenswear collections, Paul Smith clothing is quintessential Brit-style with a healthy dose of humour and mischief. Offering smart and sophisticated everyday wear that includes sharp tailoring playful prints and quirky separates, the label offers a heavy dose of character via it's twelve capsule collections. Paul Smith is the indisputable king of British fashion. As a 16 year old working at a clothing warehouse in Nottingham, Paul Smith was propelled into his life of fashion with a less than spectacular start. Destined for greatness, in 1970, he opened his first boutique at the age of just 24. This set in motion a journey which has led to the creation of his own astonishing British clothing brand.
